comments.body: What is the reasoning behind changing all `Array<string>` to `string[]`?

The purpose is simply to match the uniform style required by the tslint settings defined for DefinitelyTyped. Since PRs are now expected to run the linter I ran it and made the changes indicated. 
For example, arrays of more articulated types are required by the linter to use the full generic type syntax `Array<SomeInterface>`.
Personally, I always use the `[]`syntax except where complying with existing guidelines.
